thread.title: Watch: Lovelyz Is Adorable, Confused, And Hyper In Preview For Next "Weekly Idol" Episode | Soompi
thread.title_full: Watch: Lovelyz Is Adorable, Confused, And Hyper In Preview For Next "Weekly Idol" Episode | Soompi

author: E. Kang
title: Watch: Lovelyz Is Adorable, Confused, And Hyper In Preview For Next "Weekly Idol" Episode | Soompi
text:
Shares 116 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
The girls of Lovelyz will be paying a visit to the MBC Every1’s “Weekly Idol” studio in next week’s episode! 
In a preview for the upcoming broadcast, the group takes on the show’s classic “Random Play Dance” corner, with interesting results. Although only a snippet is shown, the girls already look confused out of their minds as they try to figure out their formations. 
It doesn’t stop there, as they also let loose later on while dancing to songs by BIGBANG and TWICE, as well as show off cute antics that are both adorable and cringeworthy at the same time. 
Meanwhile, Lovelyz will be making a comeback on February 26, with their second regular album “R U Ready?,” although member Yein may possibly have to sit out their promotions. 
Watch the preview below and stay tuned for when it airs on March 1!
